sentences.en: All the journalists were given a freebie lunch.
sentences.cn: 所有的新闻记者都享受到一份免费的午餐.

sentences.en: Awareness of freebie promotions when choosing which unit to train.
sentences.cn: 增加了免费升级单位的单位选择意识.

sentences.en: Billy : Sure have. I picked up a freebie from the diner.
sentences.cn: 比利: 有, 我从餐厅拿了份免费的.

sentences.en: Is it fantastic that Microsoft is offering this freebie preview?
sentences.cn: 微软提供免费的试用是不是很棒?

sentences.en: It's a freebie I got at the carnival.
sentences.cn: 这是我在嘉年华得的免费赠品。

sentences.en: LL: Yes, it was a special promotion. I love getting freebies. And a calculator is a good freebie.
sentences.cn: 原来是银行在开展特别的推销活动，给开帐户的人送一个礼物。 计算机是有用的东西。不过，凡是免费的我也都喜欢。

sentences.en: My trip to New York was a freebie.
sentences.cn: 我到纽约的旅行是免费的.

sentences.en: The mental shortcut skips the skeptical thinking that leads to " freebie duation. "
sentences.cn: 这种思维捷径可以使消费者绕过那些导致 “ 买赠贬值 ” 的想法.

sentences.en: WE MAY GET A FREEBIE SAMPLES OF PIZZA AT THE GROCERY STORE DURING HOLIDAYS.
sentences.cn: 我们在节日里的超市中,也许能得到免费的匹萨.

sentences.en: With Freebie Notes you can create notes displaying on your desktop.
sentences.cn: 你可以定制记录的尺寸和颜色.

words.tran_cn: 免费的东西；免费赠品（尤指戏院赠券）

trans.tran_cn: <非正><尤美>免费赠品（礼物、膳食等），不劳而获的东西，施与（接受）免费赠品者
trans.tran_en: something that you are given free, usually by a company
